name: Fabian XII
description: A point and click adventure game. This game was the third task to be performed as part of game development study at Game Dev School 2016/2017. The project goal was to create a chapter in of a hole game about: Fabien Emanuel Ripperson, a viking with  pigeon heart kindness, suffering from narcolepsy caused by the sight of blood, his a vegetarian and dreams of working as a ballet dancer, but unfortunately he is too fat. However, to be in touch with his passion he became the artistic director...
